mapper.insert: INSERT INTO task (user_id, topic, message_id, message, state, create_time, update_time) VALUES (#{userId}, #{topic}, #{messageId}, #{message}, #{state}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT user_id, topic, message_id, message FROM task WHERE state = 'fail' OR (state = 'create' AND NOW() - update_time > 60000)
